data.message: The reactions are a brilliant alternative to a dislike button. There are enough ridiculous conflicts on Facebook over written reaction as it is, NO NEED for a "dislike button." These reaction options give you more ways to show you saw the post, & can give a more appropriate response with a touch of a button. Good work Facebook Team! 😀👍🏾👏🏾

replies.message: Thanks for sharing with us, Coleen. :) The Reactions feature is a result of community feedback, and we're happy to hear you're enjoying it. Hope you have a great day! -Kate
Nice
A dislike button still would be nice to have.
I agree
Okay id the Best
Facebook we been asking for a dislike button forever😑
How do I sign up, that sounds good! My son sends me some awful garbage sometimes, that dislike option can come in handy, how do I get it?

All of you still wanting a dislike button can use your thumbs down emojis instead, you know... 😒👎🏾
See how easy that was? 😑

Facebook Jordan, we have all reported it to the link that you posted and our problem with reactions have been ignored. We just get a automated response. Kinda like what your doing to our issues with our accounts not having option to use reactions. We need to know this issue is being looked out instead of these automated responses we are all getting. Everyone has done as they have been asked and got NO help! I for one can log into another account on any of my devices and be able to use the reactions where as if i'm logged into mine the reactions disappear. Please help!
How do u do it
I said the same thing Coleen V. Williams a dislike button would actually be silly when u are only seemingly connecting to people u like 😁
